name: Task is to Survive
description:
Task is to Survive - Is a first person shooter. You play as a soldier and you were sent by helicopter to the infected object in which there are a huge number of dangerous zombies. Do you have a special mission - to kill as many zombies before the time, until you die!
Your time has come! Are you ready or not?

Key features:
- 4 types of weapons.
- Randomly dropping by parachute ammunition and health kits.
- Achievements

Motherland will not forget you!
